00063 struct Element {
00064     ArrayElement* e; // the element value
00065     Element* n;      // the next element (NULL for the latest)
00066 };
00067 
00068 class ArrayList {
00069     private:
00070         Element* head;

00072

00074

00078 
00079     protected:
00080 
00085         void resetIterator() { iterator = 0; }
00086 
00087     public:
00088         ArrayList();
00089         ArrayList(const ArrayList &other);
00090         ~ArrayList();
00091 
00095         bool isEmpty();
00096 
00109         int add(int index, ArrayElement& element);
00110
